abstract: Tesla Motors has exceeded Wall Street analysts’ estimates for two consecutive quarters — that’s an auspicious start even if the most recent quarterly profit relied on a number of one-offs.
snippet: Tesla Motors has exceeded Wall Street analysts’ estimates for two consecutive quarters — that’s an auspicious start even if the most recent quarterly profit relied on a number of one-offs.
lead_paragraph: Elon Musk is beginning to exude hints of Steven P. Jobs, Apple’s late chief executive.

headline.main: Echoes of Steve Jobs in Elon Musk
